title: SMAK Penabur Kota Tangerang
description: I attended Penabur, which is a reputable high school in Indonesia. Penabur offers two specializations: social science, and natural science. From the two, I took natural science, which offers me more advanced math, physics, and gives me the oppurtunity to study chemistry.

title: Binus University (Computer Science)
description: For my undergraduate program, I chose computer science because I am interested in computers in general. During my study, I was able to also do a study abroad in University of Nottingham Malaysia for one semester.
